title: 【1.7.10 格雷科技5/6】【16X】Minimalist Technology 格雷/IC2科技替换材质包s
author: DeckerCHAN
txt_content:
本帖最后由 DeckerCHAN 于 2015-8-23 13:34 编辑 

是的！专为抖M科技而生的，比原版材质更加炫酷的材质。分别对原版GT5材质中的：机器，工具，建筑方块，大型机械99%进行了替换。
可以更加直观的显示机器的工作状态，矿物的形态等等。

目前作者将PGTAT (Pyrolusite's GregTech Alternate Textures)和PICAT (Pyrolusite's IC2 Alternate Textures)合并为了一个资源包并命名为Minimalist Technology。
Minimalist Technology主要面向GT6与IC2，但同时也兼容GT5。如果在GT5中失效的话，请尝试使用老版本PGTAT。
材质截图：

部分机器截图



花岗岩系列


电池和模块板子等


基础蒸汽机器GUI

高级蒸汽机器GUI


电力机器GUI

大型蒸汽炉

工业高炉


下载地址：


全版本下载地址

Minimalist Technology "Legacy" now available(GT6/GT5E)
With the following changes :
- Porting the new ore textures to GT5u
- Changed IC2 universal cell
- Improved a lot the "warning signs", because I absolutely butchered them before
- Added textures for all the GT5 components (motors, circuits...)
- Added textures for the new covers
- Added textures for the soldering iron
- Added textures for the large turbines
- Added back textures for the Electric Oven
- Added Quantum Chest/Tank textures
- Added Fusion Reactor-related textures
- Concrete should look less like plastic
- Added Magic Energy Converter textures
- Added Magic Energy Absorber textures
- Added Pump textures
- Added Monster Repellator textures
- Added Fusion Control Comp textures
- Added Plasma Generator textures
- Reworked IC2 fuel rods
- Added GT5U fuel rods
- Machine casing rework from IV to MAX
- Added Portable Scanner & Debug Scanner textures
- Complete rework for all the GUIs

v1.25 : 
- Official GT6 compatibility, retro-compatible with GT5.
- Ore texture improvements.
v1.23 : - Buzzsaw- Electric Screwdriver- Fine wires- "Fiery" items retextured
v1.22 : - Ring fix- Purple drink tweak- Magnetic stuff overlay changed- Some ore block texture tweaks- Energy tools tweaks- Dusts rework- Added small gear mold and changed thegear mold and extruder shape
v1.21 : 
- Now compatible with GT 5.07 onwards.
- Small gears
- Small springs
- Springs
- Rotors
- Gem tweaks

v1.20 : 
- All solar panels are now covered
- All molds and extruder shapes are now covered
- Oven
- GT arrows
- Brews
- Dough
- Tweaks on granite decorative blocks and concrete
- New energy bar placement (maybe subject to change in the future)
v1.19 : 
- GUI update for boilers, automation machines and generators.
- Rolling Pin
- Wire cutter and Branch cutter rework

v1.18 : 
- Updated for GT 5.6 (= textures location problem now fixed)
- Microwave, Arc Furnace, Plasma Arc Furnace
- Ruby-like gems now have their own textures as well
- Wrench, Crowbar and Handsaw tweaks

v1.17 : 
- Updated for GT 5.05.13
- Tiered gems
- Scanner and Printer GUI fix
- Sifter, Fluid Heater, Slicing Machine
- All molds and Slicing Machine shapes
- Basic tin cells fluid texture tweak




作者授权搬运许可：

























[groupid=534]InfinityStudio[/groupid]

replies.author: zhh0000zhh
replies.txt_content: 图全跪了啊。。

更新日志是:更新v1.18:
　　更新5.6 GT(=纹理位置问题现在解决)
　　——电弧炉微波等离子电弧炉
　　——种类ruby gems现在有自己的纹理
　　——扳手、撬棍、手锯微调
　　
　　
　　更新v1.17:
　　- GT 5.05.13更新
　　——分层宝石
　　-扫描仪和打印机的GUI修复
　　——液体加热器,切片机筛
　　——所有的模具和切片机的形状
　　——基本的锡液细胞结构调整
感谢分享！！！
